section.earlyAccessTitle: Lock In Your Early Access — Limited Spots!

modal.successMessage: Thank you for joining the challenge!

howItWorks.step1Desc: Browse challenges by location, difficulty, and prize pool. Find your perfect thrill.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Reserve your spot and show up ready to dominate. Bring your A-game.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Claim your prizes and share your victory. Build your reputation as a champion.

heroCarousel.challengerHeadline: Dare to Dominate. Book Challenges. Win Prizes.
heroCarousel.challengerSubhead: Join the waitlist and get 10% off your first adventure.
heroCarousel.vendorHeadline: Turn ur business into a gold mine. Host unforgettable challenges
heroCarousel.vendorSubhead: Apply now with zero upfront cost.
heroCarousel.ambassadorHeadline: Are you an influencer? Inspire & Sponsor epic Challenges and earn with us.
heroCarousel.ambassadorSubhead: Are you an influencer? Partner with us to sponsor and promote epic challenges.

reasons.title: No More FOMO
reasons.desc: Never miss out on the hottest challenges in your city. Be first to know, first to compete.

reasons.title: Digital Bragging Rights
reasons.desc: Share your wins across all platforms. Build your personal brand as a champion.

reasons.title: Connect & Conquer
reasons.desc: Meet like-minded thrill-seekers. Form teams, make friends, create memories.

reasons.title: Win Real Prizes
reasons.desc: Cash, gadgets, experiences, and exclusive merchandise. Every challenge has rewards.

benefits.title: Competition
benefits.desc: Push your limits and discover what you're truly capable of achieving based on ur own interest.

benefits.title: Connection
benefits.desc: Build lasting friendships with people who share your passion for adventure.

benefits.title: Rewards
benefits.desc: win prizes, discounts, and exclusive access to premium challenges.

benefits.title: Memories
benefits.desc: Create unforgettable experiences that you'll be talking about for years.
